snippet: A New York-bred filly that escaped horse slaughter is not sick; she is healthy and sound. She is not old and feeble; she is young and scopey. She is far from dangerous; according to her former trainer she is a "sweetheart."
abstract: A New York-bred filly that escaped horse slaughter is not sick; she is healthy and sound. She is not old and feeble; she is young and scopey. She is far from dangerous; according to her former trainer she is a "sweetheart."

headline.main: A 4-Year-Old Filly Is Safe, and Sound
